structured.description: A bald man with a prominent reddish-brown beard is depicted from the chest up, wearing professional business attire. He is smiling directly at the viewer, conveying a friendly and approachable demeanor. The subject is set against a dark blue background featuring an abstract network of glowing lines and interconnected dots, suggesting a technological or digital theme.
structured.facial_features: The avatar has a bald head and a full, well-groomed reddish-brown beard. His eyebrows are dark and his eyes are light in color.
structured.expression: The man has a broad, open-mouthed smile, showing his teeth, and his eyes are looking directly forward.
structured.attire: He is wearing a black suit jacket over a crisp white collared shirt, complemented by a bright blue patterned tie.
structured.palette: The dominant colors are dark blue from the background, black and white from the attire, and the warm reddish-brown of the beard. The lighting is bright and even on the subject, with glowing blue accents in the background.
structured.background: The background is a deep blue, featuring a digital network pattern composed of glowing light blue lines connecting various small, luminous dots.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
